title: BRIEF-Only-Apartments H1 net loss widens to 0.6 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-Only-Apartments H1 net loss widens to 0.6 mln euros Sept 30 
* H1 revenue 2.4 million euros ($2.7 million) versus 2.7 million euros year ago 
* H1 net loss 616,400 euros versus loss 35,090 euros year ago 
* H1 EBITDA loss 303,390 euros versus profit 147,370 euros year ago 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8911 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
